manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: SYSKENI Magnetic Tiles We encourage learning through play, exploring cause and effect and other logical principles while developing hand-eye coordination, fine motor skills, and logical thinking. Enjoy building without guidance or help with the toy magnetic building sets, or share with multiple people and enjoy the joy and satisfaction of building together.

STEM Learning Resources Toys for Toddlers 1-3 Magnetic building blocks promote STEM (Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics) learning in a hands-on and engaging way. Through playing with those colorful building blocks,toddlers age 1-2 2-4 3-5 4-8 can develop spatial awareness, problem-solving skills, logical thinking, and an understanding of basic scientific principles such as magnetism.

SYSKENI Magnetic Blocks Specification Product Size 1.22*1.22*1.22 inch Safe Size Package Included 20pcs Magentic Blocks and Idea Book Magnet Force 3800+ GS For Toddlers Age 3 and up Usage Develop Creativity and Imagination Product Material 100% Recycled Plastic

Different Ages Kids Explore Endless Fun From 2D-3D It's a interesting toys for toddler girls boys age 1-2 2-4 3-5 4-8,they can build from simple 2D to complex 3D constructions.Macaron magnetic building blocks can help children master the basic knowledge of geometry,magnets,structure,3D form,develop children's imagination,creativity,motor skills,3D spatial thinking,logical ability,color and shape recognition.

Safe Material for Baby All products are made of high-quality, non-toxic ABS material.Don't worry about little babies' safety while playing. Upgraded Magnet Structure New generation magnetic building blocks with new structure,strong magnetism on 6 side of the block will bring more creativity. 1.22inch Larger Size Smooth round edge magnetic blocks with suitable size of 1.22inch,it's easy for kids to hold and no worry of swallow risk.

20 pcs Colorful Magnetic Blocks Imagination and Creativity-- Magnetic building blocks develop young children's imagination and creativity, exercising their talents in architecture and design. Increase their interest in doing what they want and keep them focused on one thing and enjoy their childhood.This building blocks have 4 bright colors to attract children to learn counting, stacking, and toppling.These magnetic blocks are waterproof and easy to clean.Ideal gift for toddlers, kids, boys and girls age 3/4/5/6/7/8 for Christmas, birthday party, children's day, school or other activities.

Special Gift Choice for Kids on Any Occasion Unique macaron color magnetic building blocks are well-made & packed with exquisite craftsmanship.Suitable for 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 years old age babies,infants,toddlers,preschoolers,boys,girls,schoolmate,classmate,teens.Suitable for any festivals and occasions,like birthdays,Christmas,Easter,Preschool,Day Care Centers and so on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My granddaughter loves them!
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughter loves building with blocks and also enjoys playing with magnets of the fridge so this was the perfect gift for her. She loves them! I only wish there were more. She is 4 and they sparked her imagination for sure. They have been the Christmas present she has played with the most.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and clean up. My daughter does great with them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great but doesn’t always stick
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves these blocks! They are fun colors and a great size. My only con with these, is that they don’t always stick to each other. It depends on the block and what side of the block is being stacked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My grand daughter absolutely loves these blocks.She could use a few more boxes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My toddler loves this! This is amazing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My 2 and 4 yr old grandkids love these. Easy to play with.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not safe for under 3!
reviews.reviewText: These are TINY! Definitely bad advertising. These were supposed to be for my daughter’s first bday but they are absolutely dangerous and a choking hazard. Will be returning asap.Makes me mad how bad the scale was when they clearly photoshopped the blocks into the pictures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Misleading images, too small
reviews.reviewText: I was really excited about these but was really bummed when they arrived. I didn't realize how small they are. The images are misleading and after searching I finally found that they are only 1.2 inches. I think I'm going to return them since my daughter won't be old enough to play with them safely for a while.
